infos.value: You're like a forlorn mutt, barking loudest in its master's absence...
I believe their names were...Xiza and Vistralle?
It seems you have forgotten that they're no longer by your side.
We don't need them to deal with the likes of you!
Mock me all you want for being a samurai of a small nation like Ovis.
You'll regret it...in the next life.
